title: Video: iamamiwhoami – FOUNTAIN
body:
Fur coats, boats, water, mountains, excessive eye makeup and dolphins:

With a video perfectly complimenting the watery, reverb drenched synths and beckoning vocal performance, Swedish artist **iamamiwhoami**, aka Joanna Lee’s most recent effort, _fountain_, is one of her strongest to date.

 There are elements of **Tycho**\-esque glistening production throughout, all of which are set to a mystifyingly melodic hook.

Watch out for some interesting clothing choices.
